schema.types#

Dataclass-based runtime configuration types.

class data_handling.schema.types.DomainConfig(name: str, enabled: bool = True, tags: list[str] = <factory>, inputs: dict[str, ~data_handling.schema.types.IOConfig]=<factory>, outputs: dict[str, ~data_handling.schema.types.IOConfig]=<factory>, params: dict[str, ~typing.Any]=<factory>, schedule: ScheduleConfig = <factory>)#

Bases: object

Configuration for a domain pipeline.

name: str#
outputs: dict[str, IOConfig]#
params: dict[str, Any]#
schedule: ScheduleConfig#
tags: list[str]#
class data_handling.schema.types.FileFormat(*values)#

Bases: str, Enum

Supported file formats.

JSON = 'json'#

SQL = 'sql'#
class data_handling.schema.types.GlobalConfig(env: str, logging: LoggingConfig, active_domains: list[str] = <factory>, active_tags: list[str] = <factory>, domains: dict[str, ~data_handling.schema.types.DomainConfig]=<factory>)#
